summary: A personal project in the making to become a fully voiced and unique follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
General Dalton Charles Xander is a personal project to me and will be fully voiced and have a unique and personal story line in the not too distant future. But for now he is just a simple follower that will aid you in your quests. He can be found in the "Four Shields Tavern" in Dragonbridge. 

Just a few things to keep in mind: 

1. This is my first time making and uploading a mod at all. I'm not even sure if I will get past the "uploading part". If there is no word from me, send help.

2. As stated above, this is a first. If there are ANY questions, comments and/or concerns, PLEASE let me know and I will try to get back to you and fix the issue as soon as possible!

3. Any and all endorsements go directly to the equipment and team that I will obtain. I just ordered my new AT20 Microphone and expect to dabble into the first audio dialogue with Xander soon!
author: Runehawk11
